name: Virtual Blaze Hotel Manager
description:
You’ve been hired as a hotel manager to take care of guests. Enjoy the and smartly manage job to complete the hotel manager’s task of hotel reception on your first day at Hotel. In Virtual Blaze Hotel foreign tourists are rushing towards luxury resort and it’s your first day as the assistant to give hotel services for the incoming guests.

Complete Multiple tasks like room cleaning, room booking, customer rush management, deluxe room service & dream hotel reception management. Prove that you are best hotel manager in world. Download and Enjoy this free game

Features

• Entertaining levels of Best hotel games
• Realistic Hotel environment!
• Cash Register & Data Entry Handling of top Resort!
• Amazing graphics & sound effects of 3D!
